sentences.en: a 50% increase in the number of traffic fatalities
sentences.cn: 交通事故死亡人数50%的增长

sentences.en: A bite from a bushmaster has an 80 % fatality rate, even with anti - venom.
sentences.cn: 被巨蝮咬了的人80%会死, 即使有 抗 毒血清.

sentences.en: Crime brings its own fatality with it.

sentences.cn: 本组治愈率为97·54%, 病死率为2·46%.

sentences.en: Doctors are trying to reduce the fatality of diseases.
sentences.cn: 医生们正竭力减低疾病的致命影响力.

sentences.en: It did not shrink from such words as fatality, bondage and the like.
sentences.cn: 它并不在乎诸如宿命 、 束缚之类的词语.

sentences.en: It is my conviction , or my delusion , that crime brings its own fatality with it.
sentences.cn: 我深信做坏事总没好报应.
这是一起人命关天的事.

sentences.en: Objectivity is the opposite of fatality.
sentences.cn: 客观真理的相反就是致命.

sentences.en: She struggle against fatality in vain.
That is the fatality of faith, and the lesson of romance.
sentences.cn: 那是信仰的致命弱点, 也是罗曼史的教训.

sentences.en: The case - fatality percentages were higher in the highly polluted areas.
sentences.cn: 致死病例的百分比,在重污染区较多.

sentences.en: The fatality of good resolutions is that they are always too late.
sentences.cn: 好决心的致命性,总是在于为时过晚.

sentences.en: The virus has a fatality rate of about 30 %.
There was a strange fatality about their both losing their jobs on the same day.
sentences.cn: 他们两人同一天失去工作,真是天意叵测.

sentences.en: To compute the risk ( Pr ) of fatality with the logistic regress equation.
sentences.cn: 应用Logistic回归方程计算新的预测病死几率 ( Pr ).

words.tran_cn: 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的
命中注定的，宿命的；受命运支配的
重大的；决定性的；宿命的
致命地；命中注定地；不可避免地
死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸

trans.tran_en: a death in an accident or a violent attack
